data.comment: The match is underway in Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 3, Elber gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bahia.
Corinthians have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 4, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Bahia's area.
Corinthians are coming forward and Romulo Otero gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Corinthians.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bahia are pushing forward but Elber's finish is wide of the goal.

Elber for the away team is judged to be offside.

Corinthians's Fagner has been booked in Sao Paulo.

Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.

Bahia needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.

Corinthians take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Roni Medeiros de Moura.
